records.name: Adaaran Prestige Vadoo - Adults Only Premium All Inclusive With Free Transfers -15 Minutes Away From Male

descriptions.direction: Located in Vadoo Island, Adaaran Prestige Vadoo - Adults Only - All Inclusive with Free Transfers is on the beach. Maldives Islamic Centre and Mulee Aage Palace are local landmarks, and some of the area's activities can be experienced at Bolifushi Island Pier and Hulhumale Ferry Terminal. Looking to get your feet wet? Water tubing, fishing and swimming adventures can be found near the property.
descriptions.general: Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers provides flawless service and all the necessary facilities for visitors. Maintain seamless communication using the complimentary Wi-Fi at resort. Discovering Maldive Islands becomes even more accessible, thanks to the shuttle amenities provided at the resort.During your stay at this fantastic resort, the attentive front desk personnel can provide you with a range of amenities such as concierge service, express check-in or check-out, luggage storage and safety deposit boxes.In search of city's top entertainment, seek assistance at the resort's ticket service and tours for reservations. At the resort, utilize the on-site dry cleaning service and laundry service to maintain your beloved travel attire fresh, allowing you to bring fewer clothes. Craving relaxation? Make the most of your stay at the Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers with convenient amenities like 24-hour room service, room service and daily housekeeping at your disposal. Kindly note that smoking is prohibited in the resort to ensure fresher air for all visitors.At Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers, every guestroom is provided with convenient amenities and fittings to ensure a comfortable stay. Elevate your experience at resort with the knowledge that certain rooms are equipped with air conditioning, ensuring a more pleasant stay for you.A few accommodations within Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers offer unique design elements such as a balcony or terrace.Certain rooms boast in-room amusement features such as television and cable TV, offering guests an enjoyable stay. In select rooms within the resort, a refrigerator, bottled water, a coffee or tea maker and mini bar is available to cater to your requirements when desired.In the resort, certain guest bathrooms come equipped with essential bathroom amenities, such as a hair dryer, toiletries and bathrobes, ensuring a comfortable stay for guests. Begin your day with a scrumptious on-site breakfast available each morning at Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers. At the resort, an assortment of easily accessible and delicious meal choices are available to satisfy your appetite whenever it strikes. Enjoy an entertaining evening with your fellow travelers at the resort's bar. At Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers, guests can take pleasure in the delightful recreational amenities provided for their entertainment. During your stay, make the most of the unparalleled entry to resort's secluded shoreline for an unforgettable experience. Conclude your holiday perfectly with a visit to massage and spa on your final days.Be sure to drop by the pool at resort at least once during your stay. At Adaaran Prestige Vadoo – Adults Only Premium All Inclusive with Free Transfers, utmost care is taken to ensure guests' comfort. Relish your preferred beverage in your swimwear by the resort's poolside bar.Discover the fitness amenities at resort to maintain your health and strength during your getaway.

records.short_description: Excellent romantic hotel. Close to the beach and the airport.
